original_text: You can have him back again not only as your slave. He will be something much better than a slave for you. He will be like a brother that you love. I love him very much. But now you will love him even more. He will serve you as a slave, but he will also serve the Lord, as you do.
korean_text: 이후로는 종과 같이 대하지 아니하고 종 이상으로 곧 사랑 받는 형제로 둘 자라 내게 특별히 그러하거든 하물며 육신과 주 안에서 상관된 네게랴

sentences.original_text: You can have him back again
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그를 다시 돌려받을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: He will be something much better than a slave
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 종보다 훨씬 더 나은 존재가 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will be like a brother that you love
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 사랑하는 형제와 같을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But now you will love him even more
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 당신은 그를 더욱 사랑하게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will serve you as a slave
but he will also serve the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 또한 주님을 섬길 것입니다
